body.p: To His Excellency Thos E. Bramlette Gov of Ky

your petitioner John Hardin states that at the Feb Term 1864 of the Marion circuit court he was convicted on the charge of robbing one J. A Redman and was pardoned by your Excellency and deeming the pardon sufficient and not Knowing that he had to appear in court & plead the pardon he inadvertently forfeited his bond for five hundred dollars to the commonwealth -- your petitioner respectfully requests your Excellency to remit the bond and to release him from the payment of the same --
The undersigned citizens of Marion County cordially joins the request of the above petition

J R. Thomas
Jos H Chandler
